title: (x) Magnet logo - Armada {Florian}
content:
I’m looking for something similar. Thank you. Petter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071948im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magnet_3911.jpg)

 [‹ Do you know this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071948/http:/typophile.com/node/42511 "Go to previous forum topic") [Domaine Gayda ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071948/http:/typophile.com/node/42460 "Go to next forum topic")
author: plojel

comments.content:
Hi Petter,

this looks like [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071948/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%252BFrere-Jones)’s [Armada](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071948/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Armada/styles), bold style.  
F

Yes it does. Thank you Florian for your help.  
Petter
